list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the civil force of a national or local government, responsible for the prevention and detection of crime and the maintenance of public order.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: when someone is killed, the police have to be informed
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khi ai đó bị giết, cảnh sát phải được thông báo

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a police force) have the duty of maintaining law and order in or for (an area or event).
